localize.title: Buzzing on The Economist
localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: Thousands of public-sector workers from at least 245 ministries are on strike in Myanmar. Some hospitals are so understaffed they are turning patients away https://t.co/in8GzCEeFZ
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 缅甸至少245个部委的数千名公共部门工作人员正在罢工。一些医院人手不足，导致病人被拒之门外https://t.co/in8GzCEeFZ。
緬甸至少245個部委的數千名公共部門工作人員正在罷工。一些醫院人手不足，導致病人被拒之門外https://t.co/in8GzCEeFZ。

previous.title: A study of 1,500 workers in 46 countries found that 85% said their well-being had declined. People are reporting neck and back pain, too  https://t.co/O4gTSxo8U1

localize.full_text: 一项对46个国家1500名工人的研究发现，85%的人说他们的幸福感下降了。人们也在报告颈部和背部疼痛，https://t.co/O4gTSxo8U1。
一項對46個國家1500名工人的研究發現，85%的人說他們的幸福感下降了。人們也在報告頸部和背部疼痛，https://t.co/O4gTSxo8U1。

next.title: Scott Morrison, Australia’s prime minister, wrote in a post on Facebook that the company’s actions to “unfriend Australia” would only confirm worldwide concerns that big tech companies are above governments and the law  https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g

localize.full_text: 澳大利亚总理斯科特-莫里森（Scott Morrison）在Facebook上发文称，该公司 "解除对澳大利亚的友情 "的行为只会证实全世界对大型科技公司凌驾于政府和法律之上的担忧https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g。
澳大利亞總理斯科特-莫里森（Scott Morrison）在Facebook上發文稱，該公司 "解除對澳大利亞的友情 "的行爲只會證實全世界對大型科技公司凌駕於政府和法律之上的擔憂https://t.co/gYyeK3PP5g。
